1.title: Golf Tac-Toe
1.description:
I built a golf-themed tic tac toe game with game logic to determine a winner or a tie.

I incorporated a unique twist to score whether the winner won with a birdie, par or bogie (3, 4, or 5 moves.)

2.title: Shared Lists
2.description:
I built a web app for friends to create events & build shared lists of items to bring.

Users can invite friends to their events, add items to their lists & claim items on these lists.

3.title: HackStash
3.description:
I built this Code Challenge application with two other colleagues. It allows users to create challenges, and other users can submit javascript solutions files.

We built a method on the back end to run the JS files & grade the solutions as well.

4.title: StartHub
4.description:
I built an application that allows users to submit Startup Ideas & create virtual 'slide decks.'

I incorporate auth to verify the owner of the ideas, and additionally allow users to upload files.
